item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (942 points | 292 comments)
2. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (168 points | 43 comments)
3. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (45 points | 22 comments)
4. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (63 points | 6 comments)
5. FAA grants SpaceX Starship Flight 5 license (29 points | 3 comments)
6. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (344 points | 313 comments)
7. Analyzing New Unique Identifier Formats (UUIDv6, UUIDv7, and UUIDv8) (57 points | 37 comments)
8. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (27 points | 6 comments)
9. A mountain? Multistorey car park? Both? Inside Shanghai's £225M summit (23 points | 4 comments)
10. Washington's 'Forgotten Giant' Volcano Stirs: Surge in Quakes Prompts Monitoring (6 points | discuss)
11. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (608 points | 120 comments)
12. The Explore vs. Exploit Dilemma (8 points | 2 comments)
13. DuckStation (112 points | 43 comments)
14. First Greenhouse Gas Plumes Detected with NASA-Designed Instrument (77 points | 21 comments)
15. Google Ads announces 11-year data retention policy (17 points | 10 comments)
16. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (55 points | 22 comments)
17. PayPal (USA) will automatically share data about you to participating stores (190 points | 58 comments)
18. IcePanel (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers in Vancouver ( | hide)
19. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (412 points | 286 comments)
20. Machine learning and information theory concepts towards an AI Mathematician (83 points | 13 comments)
21. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (122 points | 22 comments)
22. Ask HN: If you were rewriting Emacs from scratch, what would you do differently? (53 points | 105 comments)
23. Swarm, a new agent framework by OpenAI (212 points | 84 comments)
24. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (343 points | 48 comments)
25. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (14 points | 7 comments)
26. Turkish language has a gossip tense (133 points | 109 comments)
27. Six transplant patients in Brazil contract HIV from infected organs (147 points | 70 comments)
28. Christopher Columbus' remains found after 500 years as DNA analysis ends mystery (42 points | 29 comments)
29. AMD's Turin: 5th Gen EPYC Launched (298 points | 149 comments)
30. Show HN: Self-Hostable Algolia DocSearch Replacement (99 points | 40 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
